HTMLVideoElementDisablePictureInPicture.summary: The disablePictureInPicture property reflects the HTML attribute indicating whether the picture-in-picture feature is disabled for the current element.
HTMLVideoElementDisablePictureInPicture.value: A boolean value that is true if the picture-in-picture feature is disabled for this element. This means that the user agent should not suggest that feature to users, or request it automatically.
